statements: SELECT * FROM tournament_schedule WHERE tournament_id = 1
SELECT tournament_name, location FROM tournament_schedule WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_schedule WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM tournament_schedule WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30'

SELECT tournament_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_schedule WHERE tournament_id = 1
SELECT tournament_name, location FROM tournament_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT * FROM tournament_schedule WHERE location = 'New York' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_schedule WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND tournament_id IN (2, 3, 4)
SELECT location, tournament_name FROM tournament_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-10-31' ORDER BY tournament_id ASC
SELECT schedule_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM TournamentSchedule;
SELECT location_id, location_name, address, city, state FROM TournamentLocation;

SELECT location_name, city, state FROM TournamentLocation WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT schedule_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE location IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE location='New York';
SELECT tournament_name, location FROM TournamentSchedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM TournamentLocations WHERE city='Los Angeles';

SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE location='New York';
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, location FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT ts.tournament_name, td.scheduled_date, tl.location_name FROM TournamentSchedule ts JOIN TournamentDates td ON ts.tournament_id = td.tournament_id JOIN TournamentLocations tl ON tl.location_id = td.location_id;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, city, state FROM TournamentSchedule ts JOIN TournamentLocations tl ON ts.location = tl.location_name;
SELECT * FROM Tournament;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tournament ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT match_id, match_date, location, winner_id FROM Match WHERE match_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM Venue WHERE capacity > 5000 ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT team_name, captain_id FROM Team ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT tournament_name, location FROM Tournament WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
